mapper.insert:
SELECT ENID.nextval AS sid FROM dual
insert into SENA (SID, UNIT, BID, CODE, FADE, RESS, TEL, TACT, JOB, MOB, EM, USERNAME, PASSWORD, TIM, DES, STAT ) values (#{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mob,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{em,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tim,jdbcType=DATE}, #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stat,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.update: update SENA set UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BID = #{bid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FADE = #{fade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESS = #{ress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TACT = #{tact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOB = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOB = #{mob,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EM = #{em,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIM = #{tim,jdbcType=DATE}, DES = #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAT = #{stat,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SID, UNIT, BID, CODE, FADE, RESS, TEL, TACT, JOB, MOB, EM, USERNAME, PASSWORD, TIM, DES, STAT from SENA where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SID, UNIT, BID, CODE, FADE, RESS, TEL, TACT, JOB, MOB, EM, USERNAME, PASSWORD, TIM, DES, STAT from SENA
